survey_brief: This survey aims to assess employees' perceptions of mental health support and resources provided by their workplace.

questions.question_text: How would you rate the overall mental health support provided by your workplace?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for clarity and ease of response.

script.question_text: How would you rate the overall mental health support provided by your workplace?

questions.question_text: Which of the following mental health resources does your workplace offer? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Ensure the options are clear and cover common workplace mental health resources.

script.question_text: Which of the following mental health resources does your workplace offer? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: Have you ever utilized any mental health resources provided by your workplace?
questions.client_notes: Simple yes/no question to gauge utilization rates.

script.question_text: Have you ever utilized any mental health resources provided by your workplace?

questions.question_text: If yes, how satisfied were you with the mental health resources you utilized?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for clarity and ease of response.

script.question_text: If yes, how satisfied were you with the mental health resources you utilized?

questions.question_text: How comfortable do you feel discussing mental health concerns with your supervisor or HR?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for clarity and ease of response.

script.question_text: How comfortable do you feel discussing mental health concerns with your supervisor or HR?

questions.question_text: What additional mental health resources or support would you like to see offered by your workplace?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather qualitative feedback.

script.question_text: What additional mental health resources or support would you like to see offered by your workplace?

questions.question_text: How often do you experience work-related stress?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for clarity and ease of response.

script.question_text: How often do you experience work-related stress?

questions.question_text: Do you feel that your workload contributes to your stress levels?
questions.client_notes: Provide clear options to capture varying degrees of impact.

script.question_text: Do you feel that your workload contributes to your stress levels?

questions.question_text: How aware are you of the mental health policies and resources available at your workplace?
questions.client_notes: Use a 4-point scale to measure awareness levels.

script.question_text: How aware are you of the mental health policies and resources available at your workplace?

questions.question_text: Would you recommend your workplace to others based on its mental health support?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for clarity and ease of response.

script.question_text: Would you recommend your workplace to others based on its mental health support?
